cards.title: Ess Gezunt
body: At the end of the environment turn, each target regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Gornish
body: At the start of a hero's turn, that hero discards 2 cards from their hand.
At the end of a hero's turn, that hero draws 2 cards.

cards.title: Loxxed Up
body: At the start of the environment turn, the villain target with the lowest HP deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 toxic damage.
At the end of the environment turn, the hero target with the lowest HP deals the villain target with the highest HP 2 energy damage.

cards.title: Mindless Mishiga
body: The villain and hero target with the lowest HP regains 1 HP.
One player draws a card.
Shuffle the Villain trash and reveal cards from the top until a Target is revealed. Put it into play. Put the other revealed cards back into the Villain Trash.
The villain target with the lowest HP deals the villain target with the highest HP 3 fire damage.

cards.title: In Comes the Putz
body: When this card enters play, destroy 1 dish card. If no dish cards are destroyed this way, this card deals each target 1 fire damage.

At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the villain target with the highest HP 4 sonic damage. If damage is taken this way, play the top card of the villain deck and restore this card to its max hp.

cards.title: Schmaltz Storm
body: Reduce all damage by 1.
Reduce all hp recovery by 1.
At the start of the environment turn, each player may discard 1 card to destroy this card.

cards.title: Schmear Campaign
body: At the start of the villain turn, one player may discard a card to reveal the top card of the villain deck. They may discard or replace the revealed card.
At the start of the environment turn, this card deals one hero character card 3 energy damage. If no damage is taken this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: You're Smoked Meat
body: Increase all fire damage by 2.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each target 1 fire damage.

cards.title: Stuckle & Nosher
body: When this card enters play, destroy 1 dish card. If no dish cards are destroyed this way, this card deals each target 1 fire damage.
At the end of the environment turn, each character card gains 2 hp. Each player may discard 1 card. If fewer than {H - 1} cards are discarded this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Rambling Yenta
body: When this card enters play, destroy 1 dish card. If no dish cards are destroyed this way, this card deals each target 1 fire damage.

At the end of the environment turn, this card deals 2 sonic damage to any hero with ongoing cards in play. Each player dealt damage this way may destroy an ongoing card. If they do not, this card deals them an additional 2 sonic damage.

cards.title: Kugel Conundrum
body: At the end of the environment turn, each hero character card with an odd number of hp regains 1 hp. Each hero character card with an even number of hp may take 1 toxic damage from this card to deal 2 toxic damage to another target. Each character dealt damage by this card must discard 1 card.

cards.title: Bit of a Pickle
body: This card is indestructible.
Listed win or loss conditions on cards are not in effect and may not be used to win or lose the game.
If a player ever has no cards in hand, shuffle this card back into the environment deck, ignoring its indestructability.

cards.title: Closing Time
body: At the start of the environment turn, each player may discard a card. This card deals any hero character that does not discard a card 2 energy damage.

cards.title: Order Up!
body: At the start of the environment turn, reveal cards from the environment deck until a dish card is revealed. Put the dish card into play. Shuffle the remaining cards back into the environment deck.
At the end of the environment turn, any player with fewer than 4 cards in their hand may draw a card.

cards.title: Wipe Down
body: When this card enters play, destroy all dish cards. This card deals each target X + 1 energy damage, where X is the number of dishes destroyed this way.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.
